website_summaries.verdict: These shoes stand out for being among the more supportive styles from TOMS, and offer an attractive look as well.
pros: Highly praised for their fantastic sole, comfortable and supportive style, and stylish look that can be dressed up or down, these are a top choice in ladies footwear from TOMS
cons: Some say this shoe style runs too small or tight, and occasionally customers experience wear and tear earlier than expected

customer_reviews.title: They're selling Fake or Defective TOMS!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Toms and these are so comfortable BUT the thread holdin the logo to the heel unraveled and is hanging off and I've only gently worn them for 2 months. I have an old pair of TOMS avalon that I bought at the store last year, and they haven't torn at all. I'm suspicious if these are actual TOMS because this is unheard of. It's now August and I just ordered another pair of TOMS from THEIR online store, at least I know they're real TOMS. I'll be a fool to re-order from these people.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love that these shoes are casual, slip ons and pretty comfy. Compared to the classic or traditional canvas Toms, they are a bit stiffer but has good cushion. Love the black! They’re called “pearlized” black but they are not at all glittery.
customer_reviews.author: stayathomemom

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but odd sizing.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but there is a small issue with the sizing. For reference, I've owned two pairs of the original Toms in the past and I wear a size 9. These seem to run a bit smaller or they're cut on a very different last (shoe mold.) I ordered a size 9 initially and I could barely get them on. Hence, I exchanged them for a 10...the 10's were HUGE! So I figured I must be a 9.5. However, the 9.5's are still loose in the back and I need to wear a blister strip on my heel to prevent rubbing. They're very comfortable aside from that, but the sizing is very strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Mom

customer_reviews.title: It worked like a charm and I can wear them comfortably with ...
customer_reviews.text: As a previous reviewer notes, these are tight when you first get them. I took the advice of the same reviewer and wore these around the house with thick socks to stretch them out. It worked like a charm and I can wear them comfortably with those little footsie no-show socks, so definitely get them in the size you normally wear and do the thick sock trick. Super comfortable and easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Leah W

customer_reviews.title: Sized up for perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: So excited to find these for the summer. I wear a size 6 1/2 to 7 in most womens shoes. However, I typically wear a size 6 in classic TOMS. I had heard that these Avalons ran more true to size so I sized up half a size from my normal TOMS to 6 1/2 for these Avalons. They fit perfectly! Speedy shipping and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but they're also kind of a bummer. They look amazing, but are not very comfortable. -After wearing them for a couple days, they have stretched out considerably. -They are not lined, so there are uncovered seams on the inside of the shoe that rub against my foot. I put some moleskin over the seams, but it hasn't made any difference. I feel like the Princess and the Pea. -The fabric is stiff and rubbed my heels raw. I put some moleskin on the back and it's helped a bit with the chafing there.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Pearl black cuts back of foot
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe cut into my ankle. Not cushioned at all so I would have to wear it w large band aid. They look really nice just not the comfort I’m use to with other toms I own.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Puig

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the shoe I can wear a 61/2 or 7. I'm ALWAYS hesitant even when reading reviews because my feet are obviously different from others and when I order any shoe online I'm always crossing my fingers after listening to the reviews hoping for the best. Anyway I ordered a 7 in these and they fit perfect. And they are super cute and feel comfortable also. A must have 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Toms, all in the same size. The other 2 I have are very comfortable and can be worn all day with no issues. For some reason this pair seems to fit differently in the back and digs into my Achilles tendon with each step. It wasn’t immediately noticeable so I left the house wearing them and after a few hours I was in so much pain I bought another pair of shoes while I was out. The color and look is exactly what I was hoping for so I am really disappointed, but due to the evident inconsistency with their shoes I do not think I will purchase Toms again.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy with these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and “smart” looking. I got them in “eggplant.” Now, I’ve never seen an eggplant that was the color of these shoes, but that’s fine because I really like the color—sort of maroon with gray threading, My daughter and daughter-in-law both say that the color is “neat.”
customer_reviews.author: Compulsive Reader

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear to work at my new job. I wore them with thin no show socks, and they destroyed the back of my heels. I did walk around the office a bit but these shoes should not have been that uncomfortable. They didn’t do anymore damage to my heels after I put bandaids on. I’m hoping they just need to be broken in because they are really cute. I ordered a 6.5 which is what I wear in most shoes and they are difficult to get on and a bit on the tight side.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Not the typical fit or quality I expect from Toms
customer_reviews.text: I've owned so many pairs of Toms over the years. They're my favorite shoes and I'm a solid size 11. These fit differently from any other Toms I've ever owned. They also gave me blisters, which has never happened with Toms before. I don't know if they're fake, if so they're a good fake, but they're definitely not the fit or quality I expect from Toms. They are cute though
customer_reviews.author: bsz

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is all wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn size 8.5 Toms like this style for years and have loved them. I don’t know what has changed but I couldn’t even get my foot in the 8.5. Returned for a size 9.5 since the 8.5 was so small. The 9.5 was way too big, returned for a size 9. I could get the 9 on but I was right across the top of my foot and loose on the heel. I was so disappointed that three sizes of this shoe (that I’ve worn before) did not fit. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Summer Shoe
customer_reviews.text: TOMS Women's Avalon Burlap Slip-On, Size: 11 B(M) Great little shoe......good looking, versatile style, comfy enough - but does not have a soft footbed. Wish Tom's made a size 10.5, but the size 11 that I purchased fits fine, if a little roomy. Width is approximately B+. Arch support minimal. But, price point is great for this cute summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M

customer_reviews.title: Rough material
customer_reviews.text: I love the original Toms that I have so I decided to try this style. Unfortunately when I tried them on around the house, the fabric surrounding my ankles was very rigid and would rub. They’re too short to wear regular socks so I would expect lots of blisters. Returned these to buy black slip-ons from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not Tom's at ALL
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when my daughter opened the box and it wasn't the Tom's I ordered but a pair of sandals. I was humiliated. Never had an issue like this before. Maybe Tom's will send me the correct ones. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than TOMS originals
customer_reviews.text: I am a big TOMS fan and already own several pairs. I like these so much more than the originals. The thicker sole and a big of extra padding are EVERYTHING. Feels like I could walk all day in these. And they are slightly less "slobby" than the originals. Sizing is as expected for TOMS - slightly large.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff
customer_reviews.text: This entire shoe is very stiff out of the box. Not sure if it softens up over time but I didn't want to take my chance and returned them. I can see a future of blisters as the sides hit a bit high. Fits true to size. I am a solid 11 and the 11's in this shoe fit. Just wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: ZumaLun

customer_reviews.title: avalons run HUGE
customer_reviews.text: CAVEAT that these slip ons are HUGE. i ordered 7.5, my size, followed their chart. put memory foam inserts inside, but still no fit, plus it made them slippery. their appearance plus their comfort makes them 5 stars. the color called Black Metallic has black threads running thru gold threads. the effect from any angle is that they are metallic BRONZE. they are GORGEOUS. and comfortable. i'm going to get another, blacker color, but exchanging for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: pamaluma

customer_reviews.title: Mis-matched shoes nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: I received a Left shoe size 9 and a Right shoe size 8! Very disappointed in quality of service I received when I called to resolve this problem. Amazon would not replace the mis-matched shoes. Said my only option was a gift card. Heads up, somewhere out there is another pair just with the same issue!
customer_reviews.author: J. Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Love these Toms, they need time to break in
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfortable. This is my second pair of these shoes after I wore the grey ones for a few years, it was time for a new pair that would offer more support. They needed about 3 wears to break in...prior to that, they rubbed on my pinkie toe and back of foot, leaving a little mark - - but now they are PERFECT. VERY CUTE SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: SHOE WILL STRETCH AFTER WEAR!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! In my opinion, they're much cuter than the original TOMs. Initially the fit is very tight and snug HOWEVER these shoes will stretch out after you wear them a couple times. I would order your regular shoe size instead of sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Toms... just one but...
customer_reviews.text: Love these and I buy quite a few of them in different colors, etc. Comfortable, stylish and I love that Tom's is a socially aware company. The only "but" is I do feel they get worn out a little quicker than I'd like, but honestly, I wear them a lot too. I do highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: LUV 2 READ NJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute but created blisters on first wear
customer_reviews.text: So cute and love the color however I wore these shoes for just one day around town and they tore up my ankles and created blisters even though the shoe felt so comfortable on. I purchased them specifically for walking around Quebec on a trip but will have to stick with the Dr. Scholls I bought at the same time which were not as cute but much more comfortable for walking. I’ll be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moser

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these as they are the perfect EVERYTHING shoe. But they’re not real Toms! For months I’ve tried to wear them and they KILL my Achilles’ tendon area! I can only wear them for about 15 minutes before I’m totally incapacitated. Finally I did a little digging and it’s pretty obvious these are a pretty sneaky knock off. I’m so irritated. Do not buy these. Spend the extra $15-20 and buy the real Toms. Such a waste!!!!
customer_reviews.author: georgiamigs

customer_reviews.title: Cute and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I have wide feet but these shoes leave me with lots of room left in the shoe. I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Umas7

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure these are real Toms! They are stiff and very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: vickie Clark

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 which is my normal everyday size. They are soo soo cute! I absolutely love these. The only thing is they are REALLY tight around. They may just need to be stretched out a bit and worn a few times to shape nicely but it's going to be a little painful to get to that point. But overall, I adore them.
customer_reviews.author: reyia novacek

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The first day wearing, bc I have very ‘bony’ feet, the top of my foot was a little sore from the stitching, but after the second wear...great!! These are my go to slip on shoes. I teach and am on my feet constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Peters

customer_reviews.title: Real or not?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are real Toms or knock offs. I have another pair in black and the insoles are complete different. So returned them as I was suspicious. Bought them again at a retail store with insoles as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Canvas is stiff...
customer_reviews.text: I returned them. The coated canvas is stiff and, although I wore them around the house for a bit, they didn't break in. I'm a 10 and it felt like the fabric would rub thin on my big toe. The tread on these is definitely more substantial than normal Tom's. These actually have grip. Of course, that means these are heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wide and don’t size up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear to work. I had been wearing the normal toms shoes - however the rubber bottom on the heel would wear out so quickly. I was hoping this would be the shoe. I bought same size and they are too big and I can’t even wear them anymore after a couple wears because they stretched or something. I do not have a wide foot either. Too bad I can’t exchange for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: klick

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Toms
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9 and these are a 9W. I own several pairs of the exact same shoe and have never had an issue until this shoe. These are clearly counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: EAS

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable slip ons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after trying on a pair of my sister's shoes so I already knew what size was needed. I was initially a bit worried as they started out a bit tight, but after wearing them for about 3 days they perfectly molded to my feet. Pros: well constructed for price, comfortable, easy to slip on, lightweight. Cons: very little arch support, thin soles. (Both these can be remedied with new insoles) Overall I love these, they are great running about shoe for people who prefer to go barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Morgen

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m a long time TOMs wearer and has never bought a style other than the Classics before this. These have a really springy bottom which make them comfortable to wear. I love these as slip on shoes. I wear them with no show socks and there doesn’t seem to be a smell issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend-and yes, drop down half a size in order
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these, same color and all (favorite shoes for work as an LMT and for everyday wear-from grocery shopping, going out, a couple music festivals and even a WDW trip). I wear a Women’s size 9 in most shoes, but wear a 8.5 in the Toms Avalon style. Great comfort and once they’re broken in, they only get better.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna D

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes because they are SO comfortable to wear. I work as a teacher so I am on my feet a lot. The fact that they are cute is a great bonus! I got many compliments on these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Great priced casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I ordered my true size 8.5 and they fit great! I ordered the eggplant ones and the color is awesome a burgundy blend. Highly recommend. They do take a few days to break in and not be so stiff!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of Toms shoes! I’ve had 3 pairs of them so far, they are super comfortable and stylish, I always get compliments on them and asked where I got them/ what are they. Will keep buying as long as they keep supplying!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much better than the original toms
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much better than the original toms. Actually wearing them right now! They're super comfy and just look a lot nicer. Walked all over New Orleans in these fresh out of the box and had no issues with blisters like I do with most shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stretches out
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed that it gives a bit to much room. I will try with a "footie" sock to take up the space inside the shoe. I normally wear a 8 and went to a 7.5 - should have gone with a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, comfy and stylish! Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they fit perfectly. I have to wear orthotics but they fit in these perfectly and I was able to wear them all day without any foot pain. They are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: AbundantLifeDreams

customer_reviews.title: Actually fit better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was for casual wear, but I was amazed at how easy and comfortable they were to do daily basic walks. They looked better on me than I expected and lasted awhile considering how much I wore them. I liked the sole, the look. I ordered another pair recently.
customer_reviews.author: deni

customer_reviews.title: comfy, nicer than a sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I am not a high heel lady (70 plus)- but don't want to walk around in sneakers for most occasions. These are cute, trendy, and work with jeans, slacks, or leggings. A bit dressy. Ordered a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt my favorite shoes ever. Incredibly comfortable & extremely durable. And they’re really cute, casual shoes. Seriously.... SO COMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa B

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The color wasn't as great as I had expected. They definitely run big to my surprise. Worst part... to return them they charged me a 'restocking' fee!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Love Them But...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my own size. They were awfully tight, and I thought I was going to have to return them. But, they fit my daughter who is normally 2 1/2 to 3 sizes smaller than me. They’re beautiful and comfortable. They have a fantastic sole that looks like they’re going to last longer than most Tom’s. Just order larger than you think you need. I’m on my way to get another pair, hopefully one that will fit me!
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but digs into the back of your ankle
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and I'm so sad they weren't what I expected. They are true to size, but when I tried them on, the right show immediately began to dig into the back of my ankle. There's no way you can wear these for more than 5 minutes! You'll have a blister back there in no time. I'm returning these, unless I figure out how to rig the back of them. But, I shouldn't have to do that. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alisand M.

customer_reviews.title: a little too wide on the front but nice light color
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable, I think this particular style is a little wider on the toes. I would have preferred a more tapered slightly pointed toe area. Either way, happy with the purchase, they do seem to run a little larger than indicated but still fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Worst sizing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I live overseas so have to pay for shipping costs. I checked on multiple website to make sure I got the right size. I took a size bigger than I usually have and still it is to small! I have ordered the shoe 2 times now and both times the shoe was still too small. The manufacturer is doing a really bad job on this and the seller should put that information online. I am really unhappy with this and have paid shipping costs twice now without have any pair of shoes that fit to show for!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are a little tighter, harder to get on than I thought but I actually think that's good because I know they'll probably stretch out over time. The soul is softer/ cushier than I expected which is also very nice! They are very comfortable so far( though I haven't actually walked in them too much yet). I expect them to last long and be a great go to shoe! Might even order another pair in another color/print in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Quickly became a favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Normally Toms don’t fit my wide feet. I ordered these because the reviews said they fit differently than regular Toms. I found this to be very true. I still ordered a 1/2 size up, and I’m glad I did. They fit perfectly. After wearing them a few times, I have broken them in and they are now comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and yes they are authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes.. and yes they are authentic! To those that are saying these are knockoffs due to the inside label not having the trademark symbol in sole.. that is false. I bought these same shoes from macys at a much higher price then on Amazon and they do not have the TM inside either. And neither do my Tom's that I bought from the Tom's website. See attached image (from left to right - macys, amazon and Tom's website)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Surprised with how much I like these! I have had bad luck buying shoes online, yet I keep doing it. These don’t rub anywhere, they don’t squeeze my foot at any point and they breathe really well. My feet never get sweaty without socks in them.
customer_reviews.author: Danae

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff canvas
customer_reviews.text: I love Toms shoes but these are not quite what I was expecting. The canvas is very stiff and after wearing them around the house for two minutes I could feel they were starting to give me blisters and I don’t easily get blisters.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Bad tread.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great, however, the tread on the bottom is terrible. On smooth surfaces, it feels like your foot slips momentarily. I’d compare it to walking on sand. For paying almost $60, I anticipated better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were claimed to be more comfortable than Bobs. I didn’t think so. Gave them 3 chances and they never were comfortable. Maybe it’s my foot ??
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Genero

customer_reviews.title: It's a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's not a true fitted shoe, had to half size up. The back of the shoe was rubbing my Achilles tendon pretty bad, It's painful to walk with this problem. Hopefully I will break the shoe in to stop the rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: DESIREE H.

customer_reviews.title: Causes blisters on the back of my heel.
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and was excited that they have a thicker sole,but unfortunately they hurt my feet. I bought a product that is supposed to stop blisters. Hopefully they will be better when they are broken in. Right now I only wear them if I know that I won’t be walking much.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Like the canvas kind but nicer
customer_reviews.text: These fit the same as my regular canvas Toms but seem a little dressier. There is slightly better arch support than regular but don't expect greatness.
customer_reviews.author: T. W.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Second time buying this shoe bc I wore out the first pair. First time buying on Amazon. Exactly what I expected. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: smilie08

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazon beat Nordstrom rack on pricing of these shoes..thank you Amazon! $20 dollar difference. Very comfortable shoe, walk in them frequently, tread still in tact. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun everyday shors
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes. I have them in many styles and colors. Plus the company has a good business ethic: one pair to a child in need for each pair purchased.
customer_reviews.author: aletia

customer_reviews.title: Odd Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have many other size 10 pairs of Tom's in this sneaker style, but for whatever reason, this size 10 pair fit too snug. It may have to do with the metallic fabric, but the shoe was not comfortable so I sent it back. Also, the heel area seemed very stiff, and had I decided to keep them, surely would have created a blister.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Restocking Fee!
customer_reviews.text: One star was not for the shoe but for the restocking fee. Loved the shoe but did not fit as expected. I've tried this shoe in the mall and a 7 fits perfectly. Wanted to save a little money and ordered it through ShoeZoo but was disappointed that it was too big. Had to return and was hit with a RESTOCKING FEE! I heard of restocking fee for electronics but shoes?!?! I lost half of my money (return shipping plus restocking fee). Lesson learned, will never order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Muoi

customer_reviews.title: Cute but rubs weird.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these. They are so much sturdier than the original toms. They are cute. They are snug at first but stretch. There is one spot where the seam is on the front that rubs horribly. I’ve worn them enough where they should be broken in but instead I have a very large bruise on my toe and pain. Unfortunately these aren’t going to work.
customer_reviews.author: BJK

customer_reviews.title: Came with a stain :(
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Tom's! These are gorgeous and perfect...minus the stain! Already dirty but still in the box :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Tom's Avalons, and I will almost certainly buy more in other colors. They are very well-made, and they go well with anything from slacks to shorts to a casual dress. The suede material adds a little something special to the look. Most importantly, however, they are the most comfortable shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Klausner

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: It was a little small for me but that might be my problem not realizing my own size. I love them though. Wear them everyday
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Really like!
customer_reviews.text: Can definitely recommend. Fits exactly as supposed to as with most Toms. Very happy with delivery and quality.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and comfortable. As with all shoes these days, it could use more cushion and arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the material, the slightly metallic fabric can be dressed up or down. The fit is good, they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not really that comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really do not find these shoes to be very comfortable. Definitely nothing overly special about them.
customer_reviews.author: Tapsy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My feet are narrow and need good all around support. So many shoes are loose without structure, but these shoes are PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Mom & Military Spouse

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I have other pairs of Avalon’s and the 9.5 fits perfectly. I ordered the rose gild metallic and it was so tight I could hardly get it on the. The heels slants inward toward the ankle and is much higher and harder than my other pairs. They were awfully uncomfortable! I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: More support!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved the original Toms but these have so much more support than those. While they don’t have much it’s just right for me. I have very flat feet. I love this style of shoe but my feet are so narrow and I’m not able to wear some of the other brands so these are perfect! These also fit truer to size than the original Toms, in those I wore a 8.5, these I wear a 9 (which is my normal size in shoes).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All Purpose Shoe1
customer_reviews.text: I love Tom's Avalon loafers. I have worn them for a number of years in several colors. They work with everything, they are comfortable and they are a great company. You can feel good supporting their mission and being comfy in a great shoe. This color is super for fall.
customer_reviews.author: Mum2many

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I love these. A tad big, but I knew some Toms run a little big, so I wasn't surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking BUT Super Tight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE how these Toms look but I’m giving it 3 stars for being unusually narrow. I have slightly wide feet, but in general, all my shoes are (and I’m able to fit) standard width shoes. These, however, were extremely narrow/tight and thus, had to be returned. They don’t offer these shoes in a wider size either so that was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfie (eventually)
customer_reviews.text: I have these in two colors. They ripped the back of my ankles to shreds both times breaking them in. After that, they are the most comfortable walking shoe I have.
customer_reviews.author: JAMW

customer_reviews.title: I love Toms--this style especially.
customer_reviews.text: Good seller and good price. I have bought this style of Toms for several years and it is my favorite style. So versatile.
customer_reviews.author: KS Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. I like the color and the thicker sole compared to the original TOMS' sole. They are not my most comfortable shoe but I've worn them once all day and they worked pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: ViMae

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand but sometimes the size is different for me depending on the style of the shoe. The toe area is a bit tight but still comfortable. Overall it's a quality product with good support.
customer_reviews.author: Calla

customer_reviews.title: Toms fan
customer_reviews.text: These are my 7th pair of Toms. I ordered these in 9.5 in mauve. I like them a lot. My foot is a bit narrow so they were a bit wide on my foot as expected and there is room for my orthotic which is a good thing because Toms shoes offer no support. This mauve is a coated canvas and in one spot the color smeared onto the white sole. That's not cool but also not too big a deal.
customer_reviews.author: FreeReader

customer_reviews.title: These pair of shoes constantly eat way at the back of my foot and produce painful peeling skin there
customer_reviews.text: Tom's are immensely overrated. These pair of shoes constantly eat way at the back of my foot and produce painful peeling skin there. I even sized up knowing this could happen and it still feels worse than any other pair of shoe I own. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than standard for this brand.
customer_reviews.text: This cut was smaller than regular style of this brand my wife likes.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Babic

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes- but started to get an odor in them very quickly. Ended up having to throw them away
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Weldon

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical buying shoes I've never tried on before, but gave it a try. They fit perfectly for me. They are SO comfortable and stylish. I feel well balanced when walking or standing. I will purchase more in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Momofone

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fun print, comfortable and worth the money. Fits as expected. I will buy other patterns.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: I thought I would like these shoes based on reviews and TOMS being a ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like these shoes based on reviews and TOMS being a popular brand. However, although the shoes fit fine, they were extremely uncomfortable on the back of my feet (heel area). it scraped the skin off and led to painful sores on both feet. I had to send these back.
customer_reviews.author: Deannea

customer_reviews.title: perfect slip on!
customer_reviews.text: this is the fourth pair of this style I have owned, I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is our school color where I work. Now everyone wants a pair! Super comfy and better support than regular TOMs with the thicker sole. Love! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Patti M

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned 4 other pairs of these shoes, I love them. Super comfortable, I can walk all over town without getting sore feet. And they look so much nicer than sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: hanna

customer_reviews.title: Toms sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe and comfortable. I wear all day and have had no problems. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These fit really small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute, but fit really small. I normally wear a size 7.5 in Tom's shoes, and these fit extremely tight. I couldn't get me foot in with or without a sock. I would recommend if you purchase these, you go up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: #teamiphone7

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. I can wear all day and have no rubbing on the back of my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute:)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes:) They are pretty awesome:) love the color and they are comfortable. They actually have some cushion:)
customer_reviews.author: Dina Rodriguez-Landry

customer_reviews.title: These had to go back!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible feel. I love several toms and I love them. These slip ons hurt the top of my feet. Not comfy at all! Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Comfortable the first day I wore them! I ordered down a half a size and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: Used and dirty!
customer_reviews.text: These were clearly used. I am so upset. I was wanting these for a trip because they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TOMS Women's Avalon Slip-Ons
product_meta.description: Fashion slip-on, textile upper, cotton twill sock liner, removable comfort insole, toms “avalon” low-profile rubber cupsole
feature_bullets: Fashion slip-on, textile upper, cotton twill sock liner, removable comfort insole, toms "avalon" low-profile rubber cupsole^With every pair of shoes you purchase, toms will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. one for one^Fashion slip-on, textile upper, cotton twill sock liner, removable comfort insole, toms "avalon" low-profile rubber cupsole
